item.description:
Annual PawSox FanFest...... in Rhode Island

 

As of 7.24 I already purchased the tickets for this event.  If you RSVP that you are coming after this date then you will need to purchase your own tickets.  Our tickets are in Row: HH, Section: RED 8, Seats 15-19.  Please remember to come back to the site and put in that you have your tickets so I know to be looking for you.

Thank you Donna

 

***NOTE: I plan on contacting them to get the tickets, so the sooner you put in your RSVP the better, so I get the correct amount of them.

While we are already in Rhode Island we might as well join them for one of their baseball games. The game this day is their Annual PawSox FunFest.  After the game you are invited to join them for the festivities. There will be bouncy rides, sampling tables, music, interactive games, player autograph tables, and much more.

Presented By New England Ford Dealers & Lite Rock 105.  After the game fans are welcome to come down on the field and Run the Bases. Sponsored by New England Ford Dealers & Lite Rock 105.

Game time: 1:05, let's meet at 12:30 so we have enough time to get to our seats and check out the place.

Cost for the ticket: Box seats are $11.00 RSVP yes that you want to come to the event and I will contact you about paying for your ticket.

Parking & Getting to the stadium:  http://www.milb.com/team1/page.jsp?ymd=20080904&content_id=454288&vkey=team1_t533&fext=.jsp&sid=t533

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811

If you haven't paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event.

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: I will update this as the date gets closer
item.name: PawSox baseball game
